name: Matraquinha PAIR
description:
Encourage kids and teenagers with autism with Pairs Card Game.

Matraquinha PAIR stimulates visual perceptual cognitive development with exercises in logic and memorization. And all this in a fun way!

The pairing system presents cards with illustrations, scenarios, sound effects developed and designed for the player's well-being.

In the first levels, an image known to the kid or teenager will be presented with two pairing options, and depending on the evolution, the difficulty will increase and according to the performance, up to three levels can be reached.

The game has a scoring system that will stimulate the development as it evolves, in addition to unlocking achievements where the player will receive a badge that rewards their performance.

The themes of pairing are: food, clothing, school supplies and toys.

There are 99 illustrations with drag and drop system, where the kid or teenager will learn to name the objects and identify in which places they are normally found.

Matraquinha is a Brazilian startup, which aims to provide resources for the communication of kids and teenagers with autism spectrum disorder to be done in a practical way and tools to stimulate visual perceptual cognitive development; cerebral stimulus; logic exercise and memorization to be used together with health professionals, education, parents or any other responsible for these kids.
